programme.title: Rebecca Gaines, Rebecca Loses (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E24, Rebecca makes a fool out of herself at Mr. Gaines' exclusive party.

programme.title: The Guy Can't Help It
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E25, Despite Rebecca's rich taste in men, she falls for a local plumber.

programme.title: One For The Road (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E26, Sam gets an unexpected visit from his ex-flame and Cheers favorite, Diane.

programme.title: One For The Road (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E27, Reconciliation comes for Sam and Diane after an unexpected turn of events.

programme.title: One For The Road (Part 3)
programme.desc: Cheers, S11E28, Sam and Diane are plagued with doubts about getting back together.

programme.title: Give Me a Ring Sometime
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E01, Diane Chambers makes her home at Cheers when her fiancé leaves her.

programme.title: Sam's Women
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E02, Diane can't conceal her scorn for Sam's parade of beautiful, yet shallow dates, and puts him on the defensive about his taste in women.

programme.title: The Tortelli Tort
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E03, Diane suggests Carla consult a psychologist to learn to control her temper.

programme.title: Sam at Eleven
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E04, Sam's sportscaster friend wants to feature him on his television show.

programme.title: Coach's Daughter
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E05, Coach discourages his daughter from marrying her pompous and rude fiancé.

programme.title: Any Friend of Diane's
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E06, After a ruined romance with an intellectual, Diane's prim friend Rebecca confides she's looking for a fling with someone earthy. To Diane's dismay, she sets her sights on Sam.

programme.title: Friends, Romans, and Accountants
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E07, Norm asks Diane to fill in as his bosses' date for the firm's annual bash.

programme.title: Truce or Consequences
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E08, Sam steps in as a mediator between the bickering Carla and Diane.

programme.title: Coach Returns to Action
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E09, Coach feels he can't compete with Sam when they fall for the same woman.

programme.title: Endless Slumper
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E10, Sam loans out his lucky cap to a baseball player who's in a slump.

programme.title: One for the Book
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E11, Inebriated for the first time in his life, a timid young priest-to-be makes an amorous advance toward Diane and concludes he's not fit for the monastery.

programme.title: The Spy Who Came in for a Cold One
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E12, Diane incurs the wrath of Sam and the entire Cheers clan when she exposes a customer who spouts captivating, tall-tales of his exploits as a World War II spy.

programme.title: Now Pitching, Sam Malone
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E13, A casting agent pursues Sam, offering more than just a business proposition.

programme.title: Let Me Count the Ways
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E14, Saddened by the death of her cat, Diane gains little sympathy from the Cheers clan and begins to reevaluate her relationships with everyone, especially Sam.

programme.title: Father Knows Last
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E15, Diane is aghast when a very pregnant Carla tricks the surprised, but ecstatic egghead Marshall Lipton into believing he's the father.

programme.title: The Boys in the Bar
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E16, Sam's shocked when his ex-teammate comes out of the closet at the bar.

programme.title: Diane's Perfect Date
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E17, Sam unknowingly hires and ex-murderer to escort Diane on a double date.

programme.title: No Contest
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E18, Sam enters a photo of Diane in the annual Miss Boston Barmaid contest.

programme.title: Pick a Con, Any Con
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E19, Sam tries to set up a sting to catch a crooked poker player. When Sam learns that a conman has taken thousands of dollars from Coach, he turns to Harry "The Hat" to help them get the money back.

programme.title: Someone Single, Someone Blue
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E20, Diane proposes marriage to Sam in order to save her mom's inheritance.

programme.title: Show Down (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E21, Sam is chagrined when his brother captivates everyone at Cheers, especially Diane, whose budding romance with the dashing Derek sparks Sam's jealously and confusion.

programme.title: Show Down (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S01E22, Sam and Diane are forced to come to grips with their feelings about each other when Diane's relationship with Sam's brother grows more serious.

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E01, Sam and Diane's new relationship together gets off to a shaky start, which comes as no surprise to anyone at the bar.

programme.title: Lil Sister Don't Cha
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E02, While Carla's in labor, her promiscuous sister goes on the prowl at Cheers.

programme.title: Personal Business
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E03, Diane takes another job when Carla complains that she's getting special treatment.

programme.title: Homicidal Ham
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E04, Diane's efforts backfire when she allows an ex-con take the stage at Cheers.

programme.title: Sumner's Return
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E05, Diane doesn't tell Sam that she is going out to dinner with her ex-fiancé Sumner and his wife, because she thinks he will embarrass her if he comes along.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: WEBB OF LIFE
programme.desc: The New Frontier: WEBB OF LIFE, S05E08, The James Webb Space Telescope is now operational. Launched aboard an Arianne 5 the 10-billion-dollar spacecraft has deployed successfully and reached its orbit around the Sun.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R
MOON SHINE, S05E02, The International drive to return to the Moon is gathering pace, this multi- nation effort is readying to return, stay and utilise the Lunar assets.

programme.title: Where Are All the Aliens?
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Where Are All the Aliens?, S04E10, We’re looking hard, but the numbers aren’t stacking up, is life on other planets that hard to find? Even signals from an advanced race elude us.

programme.title: The Dark Side
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Dark Side, S02E10, Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.title: Living Planet
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living Planet, S03E07, With continuous observation of arth from orbit scientists have built a data set over time that reveals much about how the Earth breaths and life sustains itself on this living Planet.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Return To The Moon
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Return To The Moon, S01E02, The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos.

programme.title: First Light
programme.desc: The New Frontier: First Light, S02E08, For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way.

programme.title: The Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Sun, S01E08, It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea.

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: Slingshot
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Slingshot, S03E06, Sending probes throughout the solar system is a mathematicians dream and an engineers nightmare, sling shotting probes around other planets to arrive at their destination.

programme.title: Getting There
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Getting There, S02E02, Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial 'swords into ploughshares'.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

programme.title: Stars Above
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Stars Above, S02E09, Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes.

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Danger, Astreroids Ahead
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Danger, Astreroids Ahead, S02E07, The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere.

programme.title: Heavy Lift
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Heavy Lift, S04E08, New heavy lift rockets are taking to the sky. Falcon Heavy, SLS, Arianne 6 and Vega C rockets are primed to begin the next phase of space expansion.

programme.title: Mercury Or Bust
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mercury Or Bust, S04E01, The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch.

programme.title: GIANTS IN THE DARK
programme.desc: The New Frontier: GIANTS IN THE DARK, S05E06, Asteroids, the debris from the early solar system hold tantalizing clues to planetary formation. The spacecraft Psyche readies to study a unique metallic asteroid.

programme.title: Atmosphere
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Atmosphere, S03E02, How do astronauts cope with living in space?

programme.title: The Moons of Olympis
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Moons of Olympis, S01E07, These are the the Moon's of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic.

programme.title: Next Stop Mars
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Next Stop Mars, S01E04, It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Man's science fictional demise.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

programme.title: Hyabusa
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Hyabusa, S04E05, The Japanese Asteroid sample return mission has reached its target and is surveying the space rock ready to dip down and take a sample.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Gravity, S03E09, LISA pathfinder, has led the way for a space based gravity wave detector, what are gravity waves and why are they so hard to detect?

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

programme.title: Exo Planeta
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Exo Planeta, S01E09, As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system.

programme.title: Flight Status
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Flight Status, S03E03, The latest updates on the new space hardware about to launch us into the next generation of space flight some rockets and capsules are on time others not so fortunate.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Knock. Talk. Enter. Kill.

programme.title: Misery in Missouri
programme.desc: Fatal Crimes, S01E17, Randy Stone is the sort of big-hearted, outgoing guy everybody likes. So how did he end up shot to death on the floor of his Independence, Missouri insurance office?

programme.title: Sex, Lies, and Murder
programme.desc: Fatal Crimes, S01E18, Wholesome wife and mother Susan Fassett is gunned down outside of her church as she leaves choir practice. Her police lieutenant husband's car is ID'd fleeing the scene.

programme.title: Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: Fatal Crimes, S01E20, Just weeks before Christmas, in the sleepy town of Early, Iowa, two men break into the home of Tracey Richter and attack her while her children hide in a nearby bedroom.

programme.title: Lethal Payback
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E87, Cops in suburban Fort Worth, Texas, investigate a brutal killing at a construction site.

programme.title: Cleveland Killer
programme.desc: Killer Mysteries, S01E95, A damaged man turns Cleveland, Ohio, into a hunting ground as part of a twisted plot to exact revenge on the women who hurt him.

programme.title: Missing in Minnesota

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E23, When a woman is found murdered in her mobile home, police make two shocking discoveries--her husband may not only have been the killer, but he may have also killed his first wife 31 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E15, A new fingerprint identification system helps detectives track down a killer after three years of searching. And a Georgia investigator gets to the bottom of a 16-year-old murder case when he discovers the victim's body -- in the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: The Flaming Gorge Falls/Caught In The Mail
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E16, A man suspected of the cold case murder of his wife and son hatches a new plot to kill his mother and father; and detectives solve the 20-year-old murder of a teenager by tricking her killer into licking an envelope.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Woman in the Woods
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E12, In August 1972, the body of Jody Loomis is found in the woods. 34 years later, the killer's DNA is recovered from Jody's old clothing but it isn't matched until 2018.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Redemption (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E01, The SG-1 team faces two potential disasters light years apart as an energy build-up in the Stargate threatens to destroy Earth, and Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns home to find his wife dead, his son estranged and his planet under attack.

programme.title: Redemption (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E02, As Teal'c and his son battle to save Earth, O'Neill pilots the X-3, a newly designed interstellar spacecraft that will carry the Stargate far away from Earth so it can explode harmlessly in deep space. But how will SG-1 operate without the Stargate?

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E03, The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Mckay And Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E08, McKay is called back to earth to convince his estranged sister, Jeannie Miller, to assist the Air Force. McKay and Jeannie travel to Atlantis and begin the experiment which is initially successful until a McKay from the parallel universe appears.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E10, The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E11, O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Echoes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E12, Teyla begins to see apparitions of ancients in distress and believes they are the ghosts of the Ancients recently massacred by the Replicators. McKay believes he's found the whale that saved him a year ago while trapped in a submerged puddle jumper.

programme.title: Irresponsible
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E13, The team hear of a great warrior with stories of defeating both the Genii and Wraith and seek him out in hopes of making a new ally. But when they learn this great warrior is none other than Lucius they believe he's up to his old tricks again.

programme.title: Tao Of Rodney
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E14, Trying to preserve power by turning off all the non-essential systems the Ancients recently activated before being killed by the replicators, McKay mistakenly is hit by an energy beam from a mysterious device.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E04, An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Nightwalkers
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E05, When a scientist working on stem cell research disappears, Carter, Teal'c and Quinn investigate and discover that the scientist's town is infested with Goa'uld who can only control the citizens by night. Will Carter, Teal'c and Quinn be taken over?

programme.title: Abyss
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E06, A Goa'uld lord holds O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) captive and tortures him for information about the Tok'ra. As O'Neill suffers, Daniel Jackson (Michael Shanks) appears and offers support. Meanwhile, SG-1 races to O'Neill before it's too late.

programme.title: With This Ring
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E19, Brandon and Kelly each confess their feelings to friends, but expect the other person to make a move. Donna tries to reconcile with David. Steve and Clare double date with Ryan and his girlfriend.

programme.title: A Ripe Young Age
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E20, Donna and David visit her grandmother in San Luis Obispo. Noting a striking resemblance between David and her late husband, Mrs. Martin tells the couple about her romance with Donna's grandfather.

programme.title: Storm Warnings
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E21, Joey returns to the beach apartment. Rob irritates his manager by seeking Val's advice about whether to sign on for a new movie. Jim and Cindy invite Brandon to spend spring vacation in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Spring Breakdown
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E22, Brandon and Tracy visit Jim in Hong Kong; Cindy is in London helping Brenda cope with mononucleosis. Clare and Steve encourage Kelly to go out instead of moping around the apartment.

programme.title: Heaven Sent
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E23, Mariah comes to town to give a lecture at the university's new age festival. She develops an instant connection with Kelly, prompting Tracy to bristle. David tries to plan a special evening for Donna.

programme.title: All That Jazz
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E26, Brandon has to take care of Kelly and Valerie, who are both laid up with the flu. The girls discuss the reasons for their feud.

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S07E27, Kelly learns that she is pregnant. Val makes a pass at David, prompting Donna to order him to end their working relationship. Clare is saddened by Mother's Day, so Steve tries to take her mind off things by going for a drive.

programme.title: The Way We Weren't
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E04, Brandon is heartbroken when Kelly is unable to remember their relationship. Valerie helps organize Donna when she has trouble keeping track of her clients. Donna decides to make Val her business partner.

programme.title: Coming Home
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E05, Kelly moves back into the beach apartment. A designer offers to purchase Donna's work. David manages a rock band and allows the lead singer to crash at the apartment.

programme.title: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E06, Brandon and Donna discover that Rush owns the building that houses the sweatshop. David's credit problems escalate. Kelly fails to identify the shooter from the police lineup.

programme.title: Pride And Prejudice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E07, Brandon's overprotection alienates Kelly; Donna learns she's been stabbed in the back by Valerie, who juggles her rich man and her poor man on a dinner cruise attended by Steve and Carly.

programme.title: Child Of The Night
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E10, Erica is arrested for prostitution and released into Kelly and Brandon's custody. Jodi claims that Steve is the only man who could have possibly fathered her child. Mel helps David file for bankruptcy and pay back Donna.

programme.title: Deadline
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E11, Brandon is arrested for obstructing justice. David moves into the office at the After Dark and accidentally starts a fire. Valerie visits Sands and learns that Noah paid off David's debt.

programme.title: Friends In Deed
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E12, Dr. Monahan's behavior unnerves Kelly as he checks out her injured shoulder. Valerie warns Noah that he may be in over his head trying to manage the After Dark.

programme.title: Comic Relief
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E13, Dr. Monahan makes inappropriate advances toward Kelly. David and Valerie proceed with their plan to make their exes jealous. Steve performs at the After Dark's comedy showcase.

programme.title: Santa Knows
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E14, Kelly considers filing sexual harassment charges against Monahan, but does not want to interfere with a fundraiser for the clinic. Val and David realize how much they mean to each other.

programme.title: Ready Or Not
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S08E15, Dr. Monahan forces Kelly out of the clinic. Brandon and Steve hire a new assistant, Janet Sosna; and bring David aboard as a music reviewer. Valerie cuts a deal with a bookie operating at the After Dark.
